name: SokoBeat
description:
A classic puzzle game, with a rythm-y twist!

Think your way through the classic puzzle game Sokoban. However, you will move on the beat of the music! So think fast and stay light on your feet!

SokoBeat is played by pushing all the boulders in a level onto the goal symbols. You cant push multiple boulders at once and you cant pull boulders.

SokoBeat has 15 levels to unlock and play through. Try to finish each level in as little steps as possible. You have to react fast though! Once you start moving, you wont stop moving until all boulders are on a goal symbol.

Controls

SokoBeat is played with the following controls:

  • Arrow Keys: Set the direction of the player.
  • R: Reset the level.
  • Escape: Exit the level.
Credits

This game was made with Game Maker Studio 2.
All art assets and programming were done by HartoeHajek.
The music used was made by TeknoAXE. The following tracks were used:

  • Fiending for the Cure
  • Lost in the Ether
